name: Silicobra
description: The Sand Snake Pokémon. As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.

abilities.name: Sand Spit
abilities.description: When this Pokémon takes damage, it may use its reaction to cause a Sandstorm centered on self with a radius of 30ft. The Sandstorm lasts for five rounds. The Pokémon may do this a number of times equal to its proficiency bonus, and it resets after a long rest.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is affected by a negative status ailment, they can roll a d4 at the end of each of their turns. On a result of 4, they are cured.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.
